content.en: Anesthesia monitoring: Scientists have been exploring various algorithms to measure and monitor the depth of anesthesia. These algorithms, such as Lempel-Ziv complexity analysis, Fast Fourier Transform, and artificial neural networks, analyze EEG signals to assess the level of anesthesia. By combining different features and mathematical methods, researchers aim to develop real-time monitoring devices that can accurately predict transitions between anesthesia states and ensure patient safety during surgery.
content.da: Anæstesi overvågning: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer til at måle og overvåge dybden af anæstesi. Disse algoritmer, såsom Lempel-Ziv kompleksitetsanalyse, Fast Fourier Transform og kunstige neurale netværk, analyserer EEG-signaler for at vurdere niveauet af anæstesi. Ved at kombinere forskellige funktioner og matematiske metoder, sigter forskerne mod at udvikle realtids overvågningsenheder, der nøjagtigt kan forudsige overgange mellem anæstesi-tilstande og sikre patientsikkerhed under operationer.
